quest1

Class Deposit

  • java.lang.Object
    • quest1.Deposit

  • public class Deposit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a deposit of products. The class field is a product container.
    Version:
    23.09.2017
    Author:
    Shirley Ohara Telemaco de Freitas (shirleyohara@ufrn.edu.br)
